con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://com.berthoud.p7" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://com.berthoud.p7" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://com.berthoud.p7"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://com.berthoud.p7" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--customer management--> <xs:element name="loginCustomerRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginCustomerResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:customerWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--customer management--> <xs:element name="refreshCustomerRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="refreshCustomerResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:customerWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--loan management--> <!--loan extension--> <xs:element name="extendLoanRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="loanId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="extendLoanResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--register new loan--> <xs:element name="registerLoanRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customerId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="bookId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="registerLoanResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--register book return--> <xs:element name="registerBookReturnRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bookId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="registerBookReturnResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--monitoring loans (all open)--> <xs:element name="getAllOpenLoansRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllOpenLoansResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--monitoring loans (in time)--> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansInTimeRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansInTimeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--monitoring loans (late)--> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansLateRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansLateResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--monitoring loans (extended)--> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansExtendedRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getOpenLoansExtendedResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--make a reservation--> <xs:element name="makeReservationRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bookReferenceId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="librairyId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="customerId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="makeReservationResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--delete a reservation--> <xs:element name="deleteReservationRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reservationId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteReservationResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--get reservation list--> <xs:element name="getReservationListRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bookReferenceId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="librairyId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getReservationListResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="reservations" type="tns:reservationWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--definition complexe types--> <xs:complexType name="customerWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="firstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="surname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="sex" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="dateExpirationMembership" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="phone" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="reservations" type="tns:reservationWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="loanWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="dateBegin" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="dateEnd" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="dateBack" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="numberExtensions" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="book" type="tns:bookWs"/> <xs:element name="customerWs" type="tns:customerWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="reservationWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="dateReservation" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="dateBookAvailableNotification" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:customerWs"/> <xs:element name="librairy" type="tns:librairyWs"/> <xs:element name="bookReference" type="tns:bookReferenceWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="bookWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="datePurchase" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:statusWs"/> <xs:element name="librairy" type="tns:librairyWs"/> <xs:element name="bookReference" type="tns:bookReferenceWs"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="loans" type="tns:loanWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="statusWs"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="available"/> <xs:enumeration value="booked"/> <xs:enumeration value="borrowed"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="librairyWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="bookReferenceWs"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="authorFirstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="authorSurname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="isbn13" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="publisher" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="summary" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="yearPublication" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="books" type="tns:bookWs"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="deleteReservationResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteReservationResponse" name="deleteReservationResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getOpenLoansLateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getOpenLoansLateResponse" name="getOpenLoansLateResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="refreshCustomerResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:refreshCustomerResponse" name="refreshCustomerResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getOpenLoansInTimeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getOpenLoansInTimeResponse" name="getOpenLoansInTimeResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getOpenLoansExtendedResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getOpenLoansExtendedResponse" name="getOpenLoansExtendedResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="extendLoanResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:extendLoanResponse" name="extendLoanResponse"></wsdl:part>
